UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Two novel antimicrobial peptides, arasin-likeSp and GRPSp, from the mud crab Scylla paramamosain, exhibit the activity against some crustacean pathogenic bacteria.
Literature.Author: Imjongjirak C, Amparyup P, Tassanakajon A

Literature.Title: Production of antimicrobial peptide arasin-like Sp in Escherichia coli via an ELP-intein self-cleavage system.
Literature.Author: Li X, Jiang Y, Lin Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus haemolyticus(MIC=12.5µM),Aerococcus viridans(MIC=0.39µM),Aerococcus viridans(MBC=12.5µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=0.78µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli 363(MIC=>50µM),Aeromonas hydrophila(MIC=>50µM),Vibrio harveyi(MIC=1.56µM),Vibrio harveyi(MBC=3.125µM),Vibrio anguillarum(MIC=6.25µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=10.125µM),Bacillus subtilis(MBC=40.5µM),Vibrio harveyi CGMCC 1.1593(MBC=5.06µM),Vibrio harveyi CGMCC 1.1593(MBC=10.125µM)
